content.body: keithamus: I have a GitHub question. I was curious who downvoted an a11y PR question, but their profile page 404s. But I thought that if someone deleted their profile they'd be known as "ghost" or some such. Do you know what might be going on?

content.body: a11y/i18n PR template checkbox PR is up: https://github.com/whatwg/spec-factory/pull/76
